name: Crude Double-Decker Pallet
description: Goods that have been secured, awaiting transport upon a hardwood pallet. Liyue's naval transport practice of using a large and a small pallet in tandem eventually became standard practice throughout the land. These are so stable that they will not overturn, no matter whether transported by sea or land...\nWell, that rule doesn't apply if the shipper is The Crux.
